Find fuzzy matches for a target string in a vector of candidates

Source: R/fuzzy_match.R
find_fuzzy_matches.Rd

Find fuzzy matches for a target string in a vector of candidates

Usage

find_fuzzy_matches(
  target,
  candidates,
  threshold = 0.8,
  method = "jw",
  return_scores = FALSE
)

Arguments

target

Character string to match

candidates

Character vector of potential matches

threshold

Numeric between 0 and 1. Minimum similarity score required

method

Character. String distance method from stringdist package

return_scores

Logical. If TRUE, returns similarity scores instead of logical vector

Value

Logical vector indicating which candidates match, or numeric vector of scores
